definition: to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)
to stick up/to rise on one end/to tilt

sentences.english: I was standing next to the forsythia is still looking at.
sentences.chinese: 我站在旁边仍然在望着连翘。

sentences.english: Mama is down there planting something small and white over by the forsythia.
sentences.chinese: 妈妈正在花园里面种植一些白色小的连翘。

sentences.english: Objective To Study the suitable extraction methods of glycosides from Forsythia suspense leaves.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究连翘叶中苷类成分提取工艺的最佳方案。

sentences.english: Perennials like the azalea and forsythia bloom year after year.
sentences.chinese: 长绿植物，如杜鹃和连翘，年年开花。

sentences.english: In conclusion, phillyrin has anti-obesity effect to nutritive obesity mice.
sentences.chinese: 提示连翘苷对营养性肥胖小鼠有一定的减肥作用。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the protective effects of Forsythoside(FOS)on carbon tetrachloride(CCl 4 )-induced liver damage in mice.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨连翘酯苷对四氯化碳肝毒性的保护作用。

sentences.english: Effects of obesity on sperm in diet-induced obesity rats;
sentences.chinese: 提示连翘苷对营养性肥胖小鼠有一定的减肥作用。

sentences.english: Conclusion Folium Forsythias anti-bacteria effect has been comfirmed.
sentences.chinese: 结论连翘叶提取物有较好的抑菌作用。

sentences.english: Objective Determination of the content of phillyrin in Xialian granules by HPLC.
sentences.chinese: 目的测定夏莲颗粒剂中连翘苷的含量。

definition: Dahurian angelica (Angelica dahurica)/root of Dahurian angelica (used in TCM)
Chinese peony (Paeonia lactiflora)/common herbaceous peony/peony used in TCM
root of herbaceous peony (Paeonia lactiflora), used in TCM
black atractylodes rhizome (dried rhizome of any of several atractylodes species) (TCM)
Ampelopsis japonica (creeper with root used in TCM)
Ningpo figwort (Scrophularia ningpoensis)/root of Ningpo figwort (used in TCM)
